locations.name: Fort Defiance

locations.name: O'Hare International Airport
locations.description: Abandoned aircraft and aviation equipment fill the runways and terminals.

special_features.description: Units move faster from this location

locations.name: Agricultural Commune

locations.name: Wine Country Estate

locations.name: Deep Space Network Station

locations.name: Plant Research Institute

locations.description: The repository of national history. Documents and artifacts that define a civilization.
